Spec / Requirement: Al 6061-T6 or similar; thickness 3–6 mm; repeatable fixture interface
Notes: Reference build in docs; dimensions can vary if documented

Spec / Requirement: Flat response to >= 5 kHz (prefer >= 10 kHz); ~10–100 mV/g; mass minimized
Notes: Minimum 3 locations; add more for mode-shape confidence

Spec / Requirement: IEPE power; >= 24-bit preferred; sample rate >= 51.2 kHz (higher if needed); anti-aliasing
Notes: Any equivalent DAQ is acceptable if documented

Spec / Requirement: Instrumented hammer with force sensor; tips for frequency shaping
Low-noise coax for IEPE; proper strain relief and routing
Notes: Cable handling affects data; treat as part of test integrity

Spec / Requirement: Viscoelastic CLD sheet; thickness 0.5–2 mm; adhesive-backed or bonded; temp range documented
Notes: Used as patches on panels/high-strain regions

Spec / Requirement: Structural adhesive compatible with substrate; controlled cure; temp range documented
Notes: Use an aerospace-grade process if available; document cure cycle

Spec / Requirement: Bondable patches sized for panel; coupling to target mode; temp limits documented
Notes: Count depends on mode shape and placement; start with 4

Spec / Requirement: R/L/C components sized for target freq; power rating margin; enclosure
Notes: Goal: tuned shunt damping at dominant resonance peaks

Spec / Requirement: Mass block + spring element + damping element; tuned to target mode; secure mounting
Notes: Can be a simple bolted mass + compliant element to start

Spec / Requirement: Leak-tight housing; serviceable; compatible with fill medium; fastener retention
Notes: Use as interface inserts or panel-edge modules; not blanket coating

Spec / Requirement: High viscosity or STF candidate; behavior characterized by shear-rate; stable storage
Notes: Exact formulation is test-dependent; document batch and behavior

Spec / Requirement: Small bladder/accumulator to manage pressure/thermal expansion
Notes: Borrowed principle from pressure-compensated housings: keep behavior stable

Item: Optional strain sensor (PVDF or strain gauge)
Spec / Requirement: Placed at high-strain region; sampling aligned with accel
Notes: Optional but recommended; improves correlation to damage onset

Spec / Requirement: Grade-appropriate bolts; washers; threadlocker policy documented
Notes: Avoid fastener loosening artifacts during test

Spec / Requirement: Safety tethers or guards for any added masses/modules
Notes: No test runs with unsecured masses/modules

Spec / Requirement: Sensor calibration certificates or reference values
